to_kpckms¶

clustertools.analysis.operations.to_kpckms(cluster, do_key_params=False, ro=8.0, vo=220.0)[source]¶

NAME:

to_kpckms

PURPOSE:

Convert stellar positions/velocities, centre of mass, and orbital position and velocity to kpc and km/s

INPUT:

None

OUTPUT:

None

HISTORY:

2018 - Written - Webb (UofT)
